entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
